It was a typical Sunday morning for Kerry O'Connell. He had just stepped out of the house for one of his early morning strolls. It wasn't quite dawn yet and it was rather foggy. "Maybe I should skip the walk and just stay in this morning" Kerry thought to himself. "But Tom's Diner has the senior special today, I couldn't miss that. Besides, this is such a small lazy town. No one will be driving about. Ah, it'll be safe." Kerry locks the door and continues towards downtown which is just a few blocks from his home.

It was cool fall morning, so Kerry wearing his old Navy peacoat and his favorite newsboy cap. He was in great shape, at least for a 90 yr old veteran; but, to be safe he always walked with a cane. As he passed the Church on his way to Main Street, a black cat ran in front of him and stopped dead in it's tracks. "You crazy kitty, you're blocking my way! Git! Git!" The cat just looked at him and rolled onto it's back purring. "Very well." He quickly bends over and scratches it's head before crossing the street. As he continues to walk on he hears the meowing of the cat. "You again. I'm busy. Got to get to the square and take a rest by the fountain before I head over to Tom's." The cat looks at him them meows again as it runs toward a new building. "That's odd. I don't recall this being here." As he approaches it a sign lights up. "Head Mover? What in blazes does that mean?" Curious he walks to the door. "Hmm. Too bad it's closed." That very moment, a neon "Open" sign lights up on the door. "Well I'll be damned!" Looks at his watch. "I'm still early. Why not take a peek." He pushes the door open and walks in.

The inside of the shop looks like a long endless hallway. It is not very well lit, but he can clearly see that one side is covered in mirrors. It was a Tuesday evening, and Zane was ready to clock out. Today had been a busy day, but also a monotonous one. Zane had been a junior accountant at his firm for almost a year, and it had already been taking a toll on his motivation. As he was filling in the last cells of the spreadsheet, his supervisor peeked into his cubicle.

"Hey Zane, can you do me a quick favor?"

Zane became wide-eyed. "Uhh, sure. What's up?"

Zane's supervisor smiled. "Boss wants you to do the books for a new place downtown, and he needs it done tomorrow."

Zane raised his eyebrow. "Do you mean he asked you to do it and you just put it off?"

His supervisor gritted his teeth. "Pleeeeeze!? I'll tell payroll to give you a huge bonus if you do!"

Zane rolled his eyes. "Fine!"

It was already late, around 9:00pm when Zane made it to the store. The building itself was unremarkable. There was no marking and no signs to indicate its presence. Zane looked inside the store. The lights were off except for one center fluorescent light in the center of the store, rapidly flickering. Zane pushed the door in and it swung open to his surprise. It was too dark, so Zane took out a flashlight. The store was clearly divided into 2 sections. Zane decided to investigate first. . .
151.title: Zane Miller, 27 year-old accountant

1511.content:
Zane decided to start taking inventory in the business section. Going through the aisles, he passed by what seemed to him as rows of mannequins in various clothing. The men's section was filled with sharp suits while the women's section was filled with pantsuits and dresses. All these outfits were sealed in individual glass boxes, each with their own number pad.

Even though Zane was working, he was fascinated by the selection. "Is this a clothing store," he though to himself, ". . . or a mannequin store?"

Out of curiosity, he wanted to examine one of the items more closely. He eyed the sharp tuxedo with black bow tie in the men's section, and in the women's section: a navy blazer with matching ankle pants, and a tight fitting black and white striped dress.
1511.title: Business section

15113.content:
Zane decided to take a look at the dress more closely. He looked at the headless "mannequin," admiring how well it was modeling the dress.

The dress was a tight midi dress with short sleeves. It had black and white stripes and at least on the "mannequin," it was hugging all the curves the right way. Moving downwards, on its feet were black high chunky heeled sandals with ankle straps. The body was also accessorized with a gold chain bracelet and elegant gold necklace. Zane whistled in appreciation. "My girlfriend would look great in that." Zane fiddled around with the buttons on the control panel, hoping to get the case open. Suddenly, the door hissed and swung open.

Zane soon found out that this wasn't a mannequin. Almost immediately, the body fell limp, Just like if an actual human just lost their head. Startled Zane tried to catch it before it fell and hit the ground. The body fell on Zane with tremendous force and the two fell to the ground. Zane lost consciousness.

"Diane! Are we awake!?"

Zane snorted awake. He opened his eyes and saw that he was now in a boardroom. It was daytime now and he was sitting in a chair. "Sorry, can you repeat the question?" Zane jumped when he heard his voice. It was now very high pitched. The woman at the head of the boardroom table spoke. "Let's take 5. Clearly, none of you are interested in working today."

The boardroom cleared. Zane for some reason was feeling guilty, so he tried to catch up with the woman. He soon realized his predicament. He looked down and saw that he was now wearing the dress he saw earlier! Not only that, he was wearing the shoes and jewelry as well. He started feeling his body and found that it wasn't his: it was very curvy and felt feminine. "I need a mirror!" he said to himself quietly.

Almost like instinct, he began digging around in the purse around his arm, and pulled out a small mirror. He looked at himself and was surprised. He still had his entire face and head, although it looked much nicer with its sharp makeup: smokey black eye shadow and crimson red lipstick. Zane smiled slightly, admiring his beauty. The thought came again. "I need to catch up with my boss."

Zane strutted to the woman he saw earlier. "Miss Walters, I apologize for dozing off." Zane was surprised that he knew this woman's name and that he was also aware he slept during a meeting.

"Look darling," Miss Walters said. "I know your work so far has been. . . sufficient, so why don't you go home with your girlfriend Natalie and don't come back til the weekend is over?"
15113.title: Examine the dress

choices: Examine the polo shirt and cargo shorts
Examine the workout tanktop and shorts
1512.content:
Zane decided to start taking inventory in the pleasure section. Going through the aisles, he passed by what seemed to him as rows of mannequins in various clothing. The men's section was filled with casual wear and exercise clothing, while the women's section was filled with various colorful dresses. All these outfits were sealed in individual glass boxes, each with their own number pad.

Even though Zane was working, he was fascinated by the selection. "Is this a clothing store," he though to himself, ". . . or a mannequin store?"

Out of curiosity, he wanted to examine one of the items more closely. He eyed the polo shirt and cargo shorts & workout tank top and shorts in the men's section, and in the women's section: a teal sundress.
1512.title: Pleasure section

choices: Check on the kids at the pool
15123.content:
Zane decided to take a look at the dress more closely. He looked at the headless "mannequin," admiring how well it was modeling the dress.

The dress was a standard teal sundress that hit at the knee. What the "mannequin was accessorized with was more exciting. On its head was a large brimmed white sun hat as well as large round sunglasses. Around the neck was a beautiful pearl necklace. There was a golden bracelet on one arm and a diamond ring on the other hand. A bag was slung around the arm. On the feet were wedge sandals. Zane smiled at the "mannequin." "I could probably buy this for my girlfriend," he thought. Zane fiddled around with the buttons on the control panel, hoping to get the case open. Suddenly, the door hissed and swung open.

Zane soon found out that this wasn't a mannequin. Almost immediately, the body fell limp, Just like if an actual human just lost their head. Startled, Zane tried to catch it before it fell and hit the ground. The body fell on Zane with tremendous force and the two fell to the ground. Zane lost consciousness.

"Mommy! Mommy!"

Zane was startled awake. He found himself in a lying position. The weird thing was that whatever he was lying on, wasn't stable. It was rocking left to right. He turned to where he heard what woke him up. Two kids, a boy and a girl came running towards him. When they got close, the girl spoke. "Mommy! Can we play in the pool now!?"

Zane was confused by the question. 'No one's stopping you.' he thought. Out loud, he said, "Sure sweetie. I'll catch up." Zane immediately covered his mouth. His voice sounded very feminine.

"Thanks mommy!" The two kids said. They ran off. Zane felt something poking his cheek. When he moved his hand away from his mouth, the sensation disappeared. He analyzed his hand. It was very slender. On his finger was the same diamond ring as the mannequin and his nails were painted crimson red. He moved his hand away and looked down at his body.

He was wearing the same sundress as the mannequin. He started feeling down the dress. First he felt mounds on his breasts; he had boobs. Moving down to his crotch, he felt that his penis was gone, and there was just smooth underwear. He looked down on his legs which were propped up on a rope. On his feet were the wedge sandals and his toes were painted the same red. It was at that moment he realized that he was in a hammock.

Like instinct, he grabbed the bag next to him, and immediately found a small mirror. He pulled it out and looked at himself. Sure enough, he was wearing the hat and sunglasses. A coat of red lipstick was also painted on his lips. Even though his face was obscured, he knew that the face was his own.

As he realized this, two thoughts entered his mind. He was suddenly conflicted and had do decide. . .
15123.title: Examine the sundress

151232.content:
Zane decided to check on the husband who was standing on the edge of the pool. He was a gruff man with a grey suit and brown suitcase. The husband was balding but he seemed like a nice man with crinkled eyes as he smiled at Zane.
"Darling, you've come back for me," said the husband as Zane was flustered and slightly blushed.
"As always," Zane confirmed as his yellow sundress fluttered in the non-existent breeze. The words came out naturally as he laughed briefly, smoothing down the dress as the diamond ring glinted. "When did we last have free time to ourselves?" Zane asked wistfully.
The husband's smile faltered.
151232.title: Check on "my husband"

choices: In the middle of sex with Jennifer's Boyfriend
154.content:
"Alright guys times up. Turn in your tests now."

The students in the room grumbled and slowly began standing up and walked towards the front of the class. Tom Riley sat behind his desk ready to accept the high school student's work. Tom was 53, stood 6'3, and was of a larger build. Tom was wearing a blue collard shirt as well as a yellow sweater. Tom was a grumpy man, grumpy because of his past misfortunes.Tom had once been married to his wife Sandra who was the love of his life. The two were the perfect pair, but a year ago Sandra had been diagnosed with cancer and died after a nine month struggle. She was pregnant when she started chemo. Tom had lost everything and was crushed by her death and tried to commit suicide. He failed and had to spend a month out of the classroom. Now he was back, yet he still struggled with his predicament.

As the students came forward and turned in their tests there was one girl in the class who had always given Tom problems. Her name was Jennifer Sanders. Jennifer was the popular girl at the school and had the looks to support it. Jennifer had short blonde hair, an ok face, but had a perfect body. The only reason Tom had problems with Jennifer was because she liked to show off her body too much. Today she was dressed in a skimpy pink top that showed off her cleavage and a denim skirt that was way too short http://www.nsfwmodels.com/galleries/ftvg...

"Jennifer...What did I tell you about the dress code? Skirts have to be knee length and you can't show cleavage." Tom told Jennifer.

"Jeeze Mr. Riley its the 21st century! This is how people dress! Live a little. You probably like looking at this." Jennifer said as she showed off her skirt in various sexy poses. Tom had to admit that she did look very good, but he knew he had to maintain the school dress code,

"I don't care Jennifer. You know what you are wearing isn't right. Go to the Dean's office. Get it fixed."

Jennifer pouted and stormed out of the classroom, her pink wedge sandals clicking s she went. Tom collected all the tests, but noticed that there was one student still in the classroom. It was Bill Obrien. Bill was a shy student, never talked much to anyone, and usually maintained fantastic grades.

Tom looked up at Bill and asked, "Everything alright Bill? You need to turn in your test."

Bill stood up and walked towards Tom's desk, "Are you doing alright Mr. Riley?"

Tom was taken back by the question, "Yeah I'm fine...Why do you ask?"

Bill had a look of concern on his face, "I heard about your wife and you suicide attempt. I'm really sorry...but if you're bored of this life you have go to this address..."Bill handed him a piece of paper with an adress on it and quickly left the room.

Tom was taken back, and shrugged off Bill's gesture. Tom took the note, folded it up, and packed up his belongings to go home for the day.

As soon as he got home, Tom opened a fresh beer and sat down on the couch. All around him were pictures of his late wife Sandra. Everywhere he looked he felt her presence. The emotions of their relationship continued to fill Tom's mind. He couldn't take it any longer, he had to get out of the house. Tom grabbed a jacket and went outside. The town Tom lived in wasn't much. It had about 20,000 people and was settled on the outskirts of Chicago. Tom decided to go walk towards the town center. He couldn't handle all the thoughts of his wife anymore, it had become too unbearable.

As Tom walked he noticed a rather strange looking shop where his favorite Chinese restaurant used to be. Tom looked at the window and saw the name BODY SHOP written across the window. Tom thought the name sounded familiar, when he remembered the note Bill had handed him earlier in class. Tom pulled out the note and read the address. Sure enough the name of the store matched that of the address. Tom was curious and decided to walk in.

The store wad dimly lit and full of what appeared to be Mannequins. They were randomly spaced throughout with no particular order. There were male, and female manequins throughout. Tom looked for a clerk or cashier, but noticed that there was no one there was no one there. Confused, Tom decided to venture into the back of the store to see if there was an employee. As Tom continued to walk through the store he heard a scream coming from the opposite end of the store. Tom hurried to see where there noise was coming from when he bumped up against one of the mannequins. Oddly enough the mannequin did not feel plastic, but solid and fleshy. Looking at the mannequin Tom recognized what the outfit the mannequin was wearing Jennifer Sander's clothes from earlier that day. Upon further inspection Tom noticed that the mannequin had an actual human body! Rested on top of it's shoulders was a typical female plastic mannequin head! Tom was freaked out.

Suddenly the body began to move. It reached it's hands up to the plastic mannequin head and tugged it off. Tom was terrified, but for some reason he couldn't move an inch. Suddenly the body dropped the plastic head and violently put it's hands around Tom's head. Tom screamed as he felt the body pull and tug at his head. Tom continued to scream, but he couldn't move any part of his body. Tom then heard a sickening tearing noise and felt his head be lifted higher.

Suddenly Tom felt the hands turn his head around and lower it. Suddenly Tom was hit with a flurry on sensations. First he felt felt warm and tingly, but then he began to feel strange. He felt off balance, and very strange. There was a slight breeze blowing on his thighs as well as his chest. Confused Tom looked down and screamed in horror. Below his neck was undoubtedly the body of Jennifer Sanders. Tom could now feel and control Jennifer's long tan legs, and supple breasts. Tom was shocked. Suddenly a voice filled his head,

"WELCOME TO HEAD MOVER TOM RILEY! YOU WILL SOON BE TRANSPORTED INTO JENNIFER SANDER'S LIFE. FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH HER LIFE WILL RESULT IN A RANDOM SWAP WITH A PERSON OF YOUR CURRENT GENDER. REMEMBER, FOLLOW THEIR LIFE AS IF YOU WERE THEM, OR GET A NEW BODY. YOU CAN RETURN TO YOUR BODY AFTER ONE SUCCESSFUL YEAR AS SOMEONE ELSE. THANK YOU FOR CHOOSING HEAD MOVER!"

Tom was further shocked when he saw his old body stand taller than him and pick up the plastic mannequin head. His body settled the mannequin head onto it's neck stump and its facial features turned from feminine to masculine. Tom was further horrified when his body started to move on its own. He could feel Jennifer's breasts jiggle with each step, her ass sway with each step, and the click of her wedge sandals on the concrete floor. Tom tried to get away, but despite his best efforts he couldn't move an inch.

Tom's new body headed for a door on the side of the store and opened up the door.

Tom's vision blurred as he felt as if he was traveling millions of miles per hour when suddenly his vision flashed back. He was...

Allie was an average high school girl who has a cute blond twin tailed hair and will have something strange happen to her today. There was a rumor going on about a weird looking store and she had to look into it. After school, she went to the mysterious store and went in.

Allie looked around and saw an abundance of headless bodies.

"This store is weird. Never have I seen so many mannequins.", said Allie.

"Oh there not mannequins. There actual headless bodies.", said a voice.

Allie looked behind her and saw a woman by a stand. She had long auburn hair and looks as mystic as a beautiful fairy tale maiden. She went out and approached to the cute blond girl.

"Hello, my name is Melody. Welcome to the Body shop. It where you can change your appearance with a simple trade or purchase. What would be your name miss?", said the woman.

"My name is Allie and you sell these bodies?", Allie asked.

"Of course. Would you like to see how this store works?", asked Melody.

"Okay, but are you going to take my soul away or something?"

"Of course not. All of this is voluntary. Unlike the other store where they make lots of restrictions. Your free to swap as long as you are willing to trade your current body or pay up."

With a snap of Melody's fingers, Allie's head pop off and Melody caught her with a silver tray. She then made everything look surreal as rows of bodies surrounded them. Allie was surprised that this happened to her and saw the variety of selections of bodies.

"So my little head. Have you made up your mind?", asked Melody.

"Sorry. I'm just so wrapped up with the idea of being just a head.", said Allie.
